migration.context: This library is a modern fork of java-faker, built on Java 8, with up to date libraries and several newly added Fake Generators. See https://github.com/datafaker-net/datafaker/
The old jollyday project is no longer maintained. This is a modern fork with jakarta dependencies and based on java 11.
SpotBugs is a fork of FindBugs (which is now an abandoned project), carrying on from the point where it left off with support of its community.
